cyan-day_one-default.text: Sir! Boy, am I glad to see you!
cyan-day_one-default.speaker: cyan

cyan-day_one-default.text: Everybody's waiting for in the conference room... we couldn't start without you!
cyan-day_one-default.speaker: cyan

cyan-day_one-default.text: I know that you'll have the solution, sir. We're counting on you
cyan-day_one-default.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_two-yes.text: They told me what happened yesterday, sir. I'm so sorry
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_two-yes.text: You couldn't have known that the plan would fail. It was an impossible choice
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_two-no.text: I heard about what happened yesterday, sir. About Dr Blue's plan
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_two-no.text: I think you made the right call â€“ there will be another solution, I know it
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_three-x-yes.text: (It is now day three. Yesterday you decided to launch a nuclear warhead at the moon)
meeting_day_three-x-yes.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_three-x-no.text: (It is now day three. Yesterday you decided to not launch a nuclear warhead at the moon)
meeting_day_three-x-no.speaker: cyan
